node.statement: COMPUTING Phi_2(r): For a degree-2 polynomial with simple roots lambda_1 < lambda_2, the discrete Hilbert transform values are H_r(lambda_1) = 1/(lambda_1 - lambda_2) = -1/sqrt(D) and H_r(lambda_2) = 1/(lambda_2 - lambda_1) = 1/sqrt(D). Therefore Phi_2(r) = H_r(lambda_1)^2 + H_r(lambda_2)^2 = 1/D + 1/D = 2/D = 2/((a-b)^2 + (c-d)^2).
